text: Mai di na ren he tamen 4 zhou de youmu de alabo ren, bu gai douliu zai houfang, er busui shizhe chuzheng; bu gai zhigu ziji de anyi, er bu yu shizhe gong huannan. Yinwei fan tamen wei zhenzhu er zaoyu de ji ke he laodun, tamen chunu bu xindao zhe de mei yi bufa, huo mei ci dui diren you suo huo, mei youyi jian jiu bi wei tamen ji yi gong, zhenzhu yiding bu shi xingshan zhe tulao wu chou.
